thread.title: HP Extends Global Threat Intelligence Sharing Platform Through Alliance with Hitachi (Hewlett-Packard GmbH)
thread.title_full: HP Extends Global Threat Intelligence Sharing Platform Through Alliance with Hitachi (Hewlett-Packard GmbH) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: HP Extends Global Threat Intelligence Sharing Platform Through Alliance with Hitachi (Hewlett-Packard GmbH)
text: ( Source : Hewlett-Packard GmbH ) PALO ALTO , Calif. , October 6, 2015 - Extending the reach of its security intelligence sharing network, HP has formed an alliance with Hitachi designed to capture and share Japan-specific threat information.
